website_summaries.verdict: A great short boot at a good price.
pros: Good for stomping in the mud in the day and stomping on the dance floor at night
Made to protect the toes, but stylish and well-made
Justin offers the Gypsy Cowgirl boot in several colors, including pink camouflage
cons: These are water resistant, but not water proof

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this exact boot for years. But when I received my new boots, although they were labeled size 8.5, they are not. I couldn't even get my foot in it. I had a friend to try them on who wears size 7 and they were too small for her too. I'm sending them back. When this boot fits, it is very comfortable and deserves 5 stars. See pictures of this boot next to my old boot. Both are labeled size 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: These are "keepers"!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Have already put them "to work", clearing pasture, spraying, weed wacking, dog walking, trimming trees. Altho they are not "snake boots", they sure feel a lot safer than sneakers, yet, they are almost as comfortable as sneakers! I got (and needed) size 9, and yet they don't look like small boats on my feet! They are actually kind of cute!
customer_reviews.author: Doggone daisy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful !!
customer_reviews.text: I love Justin boots but I was a little worried when I read the reviews about how they fit cause some said to order a half a size bigger if ya have wide feet ( they don't make these in a 11 1/2 ). That was not the case at all the size 11 I ordered fit wonderfully. I love these boots so comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the Floral embossed ones. I love them. I read that they ran small so I ordered a 9.5 instead of a 9, and i could've got away with a 9. I just wear thick socks when I wear them and they fit perfect. For people with wide feet though, it could be a problem because they are really slim, but I have slim feet so it worked for me. But they are comfy and super cute. Got a lot of compliments when I went to a country concert.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 or 3 size up made small and nerrow
customer_reviews.text: Order for my wife but The boots are good boots very nice and look well made but only thing I hate about Justin boots there made very small and nerrow I wear a size 7in boots and shoes but I get size 8 or 8and half in boots bc I like mine Lil baggy but these are built small so I had to order a size 9 in half
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I like the wide toe box and can wear thick socks
customer_reviews.text: I added insoles since I have a high arches and have planter fasciitis. I like the wide toe box and can wear thick socks . The sole is more flexible than some boots I have tried and this was a deciding factor along with the toe box for me. I live on a farm and want something that I can slip on and off easily. The height is perfect to keep dirt out and my jeans can easily slip over them.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these boots so badly... They are absolutely gorgeous and I couldn't wait to wear them out and show them off... unfortunately the heel was too big and my heels rubbed with nearly every step. Also, at the top of the boot the strap type thing rubbed against my calves and I knew it would cause issues if I wore them long term. I literally wore them for less than 30 mins (wore them while making dinner) and knew they would cause issues. Boo... SO CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: Terp

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for my wide foot!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Justin Boot so far. I have a wide toe box and a very high arch. I can wear a 9 if its a wide shoe so I normally order a 10 so I can put my own insole in. These boots are perfect for me! It's been a long time since I was able to order boots online and have luck with them being comfortable! I will wear these boots several times a week for sure!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Substandard materials & workmanship
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed was the leather was uneven in color and the pieces used did not match in texture. It was dry and wrinkly. The stitching around the shank was bad as well as sole. The sole crumbled under my fingertips when rubbed. These boots are garbage compared to the Ariats I have. Justin used to be a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Good boots but narrow
customer_reviews.text: These are a cute pair of work boots- something that's hard to find if you have big feet. This is my 2nd pair Justin Gypsies. My first pair lasted a year and I put them through a lot. However this pair seems to be narrower- fine through midfoot but really tight through the toe area. Which happened to be the demise on my last pair. My pinkie toe wore out a hole in the leather. They weren't uncomfortable once they were broken in some but it wasn't much longer until they were too broken in!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, feels good, easy to get on. Also bought same boot in Tan Jaguar/Topaz - which I cannot review separately. Love the roomy round toes - more room than this black version for my bunion. Unfortunately the color is not true to the photo online. It is shown as a light tan leather but in reality it is the same dark brown as the Tan Jaguar version shown with no Topaz suede. Improvements that would give it 5 stars: cushioned supportive innersole, tighter fit in heel
customer_reviews.author: 4thetruth

customer_reviews.title: Justin Gypsy
customer_reviews.text: Loved these boots at first sight. Normally wear a 7 1/2 however these boots seemed to crowd my toes so ordered an 8 and that solved the problem but in doing so I think the width is bigger too. I had to wear thicker socks to deal with that as with the thin ones my foot seemed to slide around a lot. I do love the boots and got compliments every place I went. I suggest trying them on in a store before you buy to be sure you get the correct size
customer_reviews.author: M. Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered at least 5 pairs of these. I wear them for work, so they have been a staple for me. The waterproofing is great, even as they wear out. I wish there was a less obvious color than the turquoise, but it only shows occasionally. They are comfortable and wear very well. I enjoy them because we have a policy that requires us to leave our shoes at work, the easy pull on is a big benefit. One small drawback, as the sole wears down, I slip occasionally on our kitchen floor....which is already very slick and often wet. But I use this as an indicator to upgrade to a new pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Bought myself the exact pair from a local western wear store, and bought these for a friend. Same size, make and everything but it's like they were made by two different manufacturers. Her boots (these) are made of a much thicker leather and are much stiffer with very little give. It took her four times as long to finally break them in, and they still don't fit quite right. The stitching is also a much bigger threading, and that is obvious. Her right boot was so much tighter than the left it was almost painful for her to wear for the first month. Next time I'll spend the extra $20
customer_reviews.author: Kiera C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a sale on Justin boot's at a local store, but they were the wrong size & not my type. I went to another local store to find my size and what style I might like. I decided to get online and look up prices and found this style I really liked. I priced around different websites and this was one of the best deal's I found. There were a few site's cheaper, but read the reviews and customer service etc wasn't good. I try to stick with website's I trust and usually have no problem's buying anything from Amazon and there sellers! The boot's came fast(I didn't have prime then either)! Very happy with these Boots!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Inc

customer_reviews.title: I have somewhat of wide foot and these fit perfect. These are my first pair of boots and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have somewhat of wide foot and these fit perfect. These are my first pair of boots and I did try on Ariats and they ran more narrow. My daughter has these and I tried hers on and the fit was just exact. My boots arrived, and they are beautiful, comfortable and fit like a dream. Only concern was how to care for them. I am a city person, so no horses, barns, farms and such. Just daily wear, including snow and rain. A tag of some sort explaining how to maintain these would have been nice. These are well worth the money. Would definitely look at Justin Boots for next boot purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marie A. Pettis

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loves it ! Exactly what she wanted, she tried them on at a local outfit where we live, and got, I ordered them from Amazon for $15.00 less than where we found them at home......she wears an 8 in women's regular tennis shoes and other types, and these boots were 8s also, perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Rival Danskos in Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have a few pair of Frye boots and even though I really, really want them to be comfortable, they are not. So I decided to try these Justin Boots. I am not a cowgirl nor do I ride horses. I am a teacher and these boots rival Danskos for comfort . I also love the shorter length since I am on the petite side and my Frye boots kind of take over my outfit. I recently bought a pair of these Justin boots in black and gave my black Fryes to a friend - that is how much I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Steeljill

customer_reviews.title: Nothing more to know
customer_reviews.text: I normally order Ariat once you give Justin the try no comparison Justin is too wide arch supports in the wrong place boots very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Still the good Justin quality I expected
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of thinner-sole Justin lace-ups years and years ago, and they had been the best boots I ever had, so I knew to expect good quality in these. I ordered the black/turquoise Gypsies, and couldn't be happier. They took about a day to break in, and now wear very comfortably. They've held up to a little abuse quite well, haven't scuffed easily at all. I'm sure I'll be getting more in other colors; glad Justin still makes a really good quality boot.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie W,

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife, happy life !
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a pair of these previously for my daughter, and my wife liked them so much that she wanted a pair too. So a few months ago I had her try on a pair at the store so I would know the right size. Then I was able to surprise her with these at Christmas. My wife really likes them. And you know how that goes... Happy wife, happy life !
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. VERY comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are as comfortable as all the other reviews have said. They are easy to get on and wide enough for my foot. I have very high arches and often times I have trouble getting boots on without a side zipper. My feet slip right in. The arch support is excellent. I love my boots.
customer_reviews.author: oldhippie

customer_reviews.title: "Daily" Riding Boots
customer_reviews.text: I ride Western and spend some time almost every day either on my horse or in a paddock. These Justin boots are very comfortable and serviceable and were reasonably priced. They seem to be waterproof (no intrusive leakage from mud) and I was gratified to find that though they were reversibly dented, they protected my toes the several times my horse managed to step on them!
customer_reviews.author: TQSA

customer_reviews.title: Luvin my Justin Boots
customer_reviews.text: I already own Justin boots. I have had them for years and they really get abused out here. I still have my old pair but wanted a new pair to wear out and about. These are beautiful. I love the color and the design. I find that they run small so I always order half a size up. What I love about Justin Boots, is they are work boots but still look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tina the Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Tight/Small
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what was different about this pair compared to what I had before. I purchased the same size and boot that I had previously. It was really tight but I thought maybe after wearing it some, it would loosen up. I couldn't wear it long enough to find out. So now it sits in the closet and I feel guilty for spending that money... and still need a new pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the pattern, how comfy the boots are, and that they don't take long to break in. My boots did have a little scratch in them but it wasn't anything major. For sizing they do fit a little big in the toe but if I ordered a size smaller my foot couldn't get in the boot. Definitely would purchase another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit
customer_reviews.text: My foot is average and these boots were very snug and uncomfortable with socks. Imo, they are not suited for walking or riding as they were tight, hard and uncomfortable. However, they are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa

customer_reviews.title: Good price, great fit...even for big calves!
customer_reviews.text: I have fat calves and always have some difficulty getting boots to fit comfortably. I wanted a square toed pair of boots and always enjoy the Justin boots. They have fit well in the past and look good wearing them. I ordered these boots for my birthday and they arrived just in time. I opened the box, they looked very nice, and I slid the onto my feet. They fit perfectly not only on my feet, but the shafts were big enough to fit great on my big legs. In fact, I'm wearing them as I type. Comfortable and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots are a bit small, however, I usually have a problem when I order boots before trying them on. I'm at a 1/2 size and finding the right fit is always a trick. On the bright side, the boots are beautiful and otherwise comfortable. I would buy these again, but I would really need to try them on in a store first.
customer_reviews.author: coastalcathy

customer_reviews.title: tooling doesn't show up very well
customer_reviews.text: cute but tooling doesn't show up as much as it does in the pic. comfy and cute but a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lmb333

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I bought the same pair from a store locally and spent way too much. Super thrilled to find them here on Amazon for a great price. My last pair ( same color and everything) lasted over 2 years with everyday use at work...I expected these to hold up the same and give me years of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi M.

customer_reviews.title: Have to return them too small
customer_reviews.text: way too small I wear a 10 and they wouldnt fit at all.. my daughter wears a 9 and she tried them and they were tight on her also.. So they must run small.. so disapointed. buy a size or 2 larger..
customer_reviews.author: heather mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews on them and some said they had to order a size larger. I do not like returning items so I ordered a 1/2 size larger to be sure. These boots are TRUE to size! So do not order larger. I have a wide foot and these were so comfortable when I put them on the first time. They do stretch some,which has left me wishing I had ordered my true size but a thicker pair of socks takes care of it. I love these boots and would def recommend them to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: carolene shoopman

customer_reviews.title: the box and boots smelled like they were ten years old
customer_reviews.text: Boots were about two sizes too small! I ordered the exact size that I always wear and the correct size for the identical boot that I had tried on in the store. Plus . . . . . the box and boots smelled like they were ten years old. . . . . . . not good! :(
customer_reviews.author: AchowtiYAH KarinAH

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE QUALITY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pieces of crap for my wife for a Christmas gift. One of the boots has already ripped apart on the inside above the heel. She literally wore them only a few times and now they are worthless! TERRIBLE QUALITY!!! I jumped on Amazon tonight to find out they are 10 days outside the return window and no longer eligible for a return or exchange. I am NOT happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Welker

customer_reviews.title: love cowgirl boots
customer_reviews.text: I love my boots got an 8.5 fits really well once u put them on and walk around they loosing up
customer_reviews.author: Patrina

customer_reviews.title: Boot Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Found them in a store then ordered online after trying on. They do run a little large, I normally wear an 8 but needed a 7.5 in these boots. I find them very comfortable with grest arch support.
customer_reviews.author: LindsaKC

customer_reviews.title: they almost look like children's boots
customer_reviews.text: Though these boots are cute, I am a true size 8, which I ordered,and they are so small, they almost look like children's boots. I am so disappointed, because the reviews were so good. Also, I did not get a receipt with my shipment, so I have no idea how to return them or exchange sizes 😕😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A boot that looks good, comfortable and has a reasonable heel.
customer_reviews.text: These are my 2nd pair of Justin Gypsy boots. I purchased my 1st pair at our local Tractor Supply and absolutely love them. I wanted a black pair, and looked there again. Only Tractor Supply wanted $90.00, where Amazon had them for $70.00. My foot is small, so I have to insert an additional insole, but totally worth it. I am 5'9", and do not want a high heel. I like these not just because they look good, but they have a rounded toe, and are very comfortable. Definitely recommend. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Herald

customer_reviews.title: Love um!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gone through the process of shrinking these yet, but as they are right now I really like them. The design is nice and they really are comfortable. They are currently too big in the heel, but one I soak them and wear them I expect they will fit even better! I will not be doing this until summer, however. December, in Minnesota is not the time to be walking around in wet boots :) I'll update and let everyone know how it goes when I do get around to shrinking them.
customer_reviews.author: BONNIE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pretty Neutral
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has wanted Justin boots for a while. These were perfect - sooooo pretty with the embossed flowers but also useful and versatile. Many of the Gypsy series have colors (pink and teal) but these are neutral and go with EVERYTHING. The leather is super sturdy - a little hard right out of the box. Hoping they last her a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Look just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty only problem is I have narrow heels so they slip a bit...but if I go down a size they are too short. More of a my feet are the problem not the boots. Color 9s just as I wanted I just got them treated and have not worn them yet but I will soon
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie D.

customer_reviews.title: My favs
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots so much I had the heels replaced since I wore them so much and wore them down. Really comfy.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I purchased these boots. I own 2 other pairs of cowgirl boots, but I wear these literally almost every day. They’re so comfortable and cute, and you don’t really have to “break them in”. I ordered my normal size shoe, and it fit perfect! Probably will ordered another pair in different color!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! I thought I wouldn't love anything more than I do my Ariat Fatbaby's but these come in at a tie. I wear an 11 in women's shoes and ordered an 11 in these boots. They fit perfectly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie B

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots are cute and fit although these are my first pair of cow girl boots so I didn't know what to expect. They hurt my feet still I have only wore them for one full day so far and they hurt my feet but I have wore them a few days for a few hours and that's all I could handle them! Can't send them back cause I threw everything away that came with them I'm sure they will get broken in if I keep wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea R

customer_reviews.title: I love my Justin boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes that are in my closet by far. During winter, I wear some cute mid-calf socks with yoga pants with a large sweater and for the summer looks, it's all about shorts and a tank. I've been to a few country clubs/ bars with these for line dancing. I just all around LOVE them. I would 100/100 recommend to anyone looking for boots. Justin boots are the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Wynn

customer_reviews.title: great looks, seem well built
customer_reviews.text: I gave these boots to my girlfriend for Christmas. She hasn't worn them much yet, so I cant rate based on comfort, which is a biggie for me based on back issues. As far as looks, these boots look great! I was looking for a boot that could be worked in, fished in, yet still cleaned up and worn out on a date. These aren't too flash, yet have cool detail to them and seem to be ma decent well. I have no complaints so far and she loves them, which is all that really matters!
customer_reviews.author: Ryry the funny guy

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my boots
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my boots! They are sturdy and super comfortable, I wear them almost every day to work and they do not hurt my feet at all. They are more of a "work" style boot as opposed to a "going out" boot, so be aware of that before buying. Well made, nice stitching, nice color. All in all, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Need a good pair of working boots or just looking for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Need a good pair of working boots or just looking for a pair to go with that flannel you're wearing out for some line dancing? These pair of Justin's are definitely a go to pair for any occasion. They provide great support and are very comfortable. I wear them mostly during the winter as they are very warm, but when I need a boot for a summertime fling, these are the first pick.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: they just weren't comfortable in the footbed even with my arch supports
customer_reviews.text: The size was correct, they just weren't comfortable in the footbed even with my arch supports. Ordered usual USA boot size. These had to go back. Very cute though. Ended up with Ariat boots.
customer_reviews.author: C. M-R

customer_reviews.title: I returned the boots and reordered a half size bigger and now they are perfect. I have other Justin boots and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have read other reviews that suggested a half size bigger. I returned the boots and reordered a half size bigger and now they are perfect. I have other Justin boots and they are all great. I"m a big fan of the square toe (hate my toes being squished) and the square heel and rubber sole.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Difference sizes
customer_reviews.text: Despite being marked as the same size, one boot was half a size larger than the other. When comparing them on the soles toe to heel there was a centimeter in difference. That being said, they are well made and are OK. Sadly they were work before my daughter advised that one was a 'bit floppy'
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy right-out-of-the-box boots you'll ever wear!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots! I bought them on the advice of a friend, and the first time I wore them, it was to our local fair where we walked around for nearly 8 hours. I would never have guessed I could walk around in a brand new pair of leather boots for that long and be comfortable the entire time. They are my new go-to boots for everyday-type wear!
customer_reviews.author: CMcV23

customer_reviews.title: Super uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was sadly disappointed when I opened the box to these. Cute but feels like poor quality material. Put them on and they were so uncomfortable. Loose in the heal and arch and too tight in the toes. Tried to walk in them and i was walking on the inside of my feet. Not something breaking them in could fix. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Durable, long lasting boots. Can’t go wrong with a pair of Justin boots. Cute, good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Glore

customer_reviews.title: Boot tips
customer_reviews.text: With any leather boot or shoe, I coat them in vasoline and leave them sit until the leather stops absorbing the oil. It could be a day up to 2 weeks. It conditions the leather, making it soft, supple, and waterproof. I did there. They are comfortable. I have not worn them much because of the treatment but I have no complaints when I wore them today. Another tip: Wear a sock that will stay up and is longer than the shaft. Leather against the leg cause blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Olson

customer_reviews.title: I need a good comfortable boot as I work on a concrete floor ...
customer_reviews.text: I need a good comfortable boot as I work on a concrete floor all day. This is my second pair of Justin boots like these and I won't ever buy a regular work boot again, they are comfortable for all day wear and look great. I always get compliments on these boots. Can't say enough about how much I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. I wear them everyday and love them. It did take awhile (a whole day of boot stretch and using my hair drier and thick socks) to stretch them out so I could wear them comfortably. My only suggestion is to buy them a half size bigger so they don't need as much stretching. I usually wear between a 9.5 and a 10 in all my shoes and I should have gone with the 10.5 so I wouldn't have had to work so hard to make them fit nicely. Still my favorite boots and I love them. They are a great quality boot that hold up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THE BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE BOOTS! They are my go to boots and super comfy. I wore them all day at the state fair and wherever I go. I LOVE these boots. Super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: whitney hegland

customer_reviews.title: First time buying these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same size as all of my other shoes which is a 9.5 and they fit good I know with time and conditioning they will become perfect they're pretty comfortable right out of the box so I know when they're broke in they will be awesome.... wanted to add picture but it didn't give me the option so sorry about that.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany N. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Cute Fat Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I had never seen these in person but they looked just like what I was looking for and they were! Cute detail stitching on the uppers and the boot top/sides. Very comfortable - was able to wear them a full day the first day without any breaking-in period. Cushy soles are very nice and made standing on my feet for long stretches a breeze! I wore these to early voting last week not knowing that I would be standing in line for 2 hours! My feet were fine! I am ready for the 2013 Houston Livestock Show and Rodeo in these cuties!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boot best suited for a wide foot
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots, I love them. Width to length ration is off-- to wide and borders on too short. But my feet need good arch support, not provided with these boots, so I think if I add an arch support and socks the fit should be perfect. A smaller size would probably be too short. I want another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My Wife LOVES these boots. price wise they are a little bit cheaper than I could find in the store. They fit good and are comfortable literally does not take them off. She loves the boots.....
customer_reviews.author: Kris A. Lauck

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Work Boots
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and break in very well. I wear these to work everyday and it only took a couple of days to break them in. Since these fit so well, I'll be ordering the same boots with a steel toe to wear on jobsites that require them. Typical quality of Justin boots.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never slipped my foot into a new pair of boots and not thought "I am going to have a little breaking in to do" until now. My foot slipped right in and the boots felt really good - no breaking in needed. I love the overall look of the boot and have had many compliments - cute and comfortable, what more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: KPM

customer_reviews.title: CUTE BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: I USUALLY WEAR A TRUE TO SIZE 9. I WAS UNABLE TO GET THESE BOOTS ON. I HAD ORDERED THESE BOOTS BECAUSE OF THE COLOR AND BECAUSE THEY WERE WATER RESISTANT. I WANTED TO WEAR THEM FOR CASUAL WEAR. I HAD TO RETURN THESE BOOTS BECAUSE THEY WERE TOO SMALL. I WENT TO A LOCAL DEPARTMENT STORE AND FOUND THE SAME BOOT AT THE SAME PRICE BUT I HAD TO GET A SIZE 9-1/2
customer_reviews.author: BELLE SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: These boots worked out great for us this summer!! My daughters worked on a horse camp all summer. The boots were comfortable and great for real farm work! We sized them based on the Justin Boots sizing suggestions that we found on-line. Their videos are helpful with sizing. We would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: There are very comfortable. My concern is the heel being loose. But I guess that is how these boots fit. They look good. I would have prefer them without the pink trim but most womens boots I looked seem to REQUIRE some sort of gaudy color. These were the least offensive.
customer_reviews.author: moon rock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite boots/shoes! I wish I could wear them all the time, they are so comfortable and fit perfect to my size (10). The design of the soul enables you to stand for longer periods of time without your feet hurting. I can wear these out working or to a nicer event, can't say enough about these boots!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: but length is good and arch is good
customer_reviews.text: A little bit snug in width, but length is good and arch is good. Heel is enough without being too much. Wish they had in a wider size, but satisfied overall. Updated to note that after breaking in a couple days the keather has stretched a tiny bit. They are now very comfortable...
customer_reviews.author: 3dog

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very attractive and fit to size. My only problem is that I have bunions and my left foot just couldn't handle it. I returned the boots, but would highly recommend them to anyone who doesn't have foot issues...
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Correia

customer_reviews.title: Tips for a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this boot brand. They are suppose to be loose fitting at the heals and snug on the top of your foot. That's how cowboy boots should fit they will stretch over time. Your actual shoe size May or may not be your boot size. If you know a retailer that sells these I would try them on first to figure out your size before ordering them from Amazon. I found Justin's & Ariats to be cheaper on Amazon than @ Cavenders Boot City.
customer_reviews.author: Rea’s Mommy

customer_reviews.title: The stitching on the inside of boot at back has ...
customer_reviews.text: The stitching on the inside of boot at back has two types that meet together. It's not stitched together well at all. First time I put my foot in the boot it tore. Thankfully I've been able to stitch it back myself.
customer_reviews.author: AggieBride

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but too big
customer_reviews.text: These boots are adorable and comfortable however they did not fit. I always buy a 9 in shoes and these in a 9 were too large. My heel moved up and down when walking anf did not touch the back of the boot. I might actually have to go all the way down to an 8 for them to fit. Other then that, I love them and will be changing sizes
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for boots to wear around the barn that would provide support, comfort, and safety for my feet. These boots are all that, and fun to wear, as well. Before breaking them in at the barn, I have been wearing them to the office and have gotten many positive comments about how cute they look with skinny jeans. I've actually been thinking about getting them in another color, since it's been so hard for me to find such versatile boots that feel great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Hoyte

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: these are some really nice boots! I wear a size 10 and the fit was perfect. the only thing i'm trying to get used to is the rounded toe, but i'm sure that will happen soon. the stitching is pretty and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfy as my other justin ropes were
customer_reviews.text: One boot feels higher up than the other, like the insert is thicker than the other and the boots overall just aren't nearly as comfy as my others. I realize they take time to break in but I've been wearing them a lot for that purpose with little luck. I like the look of them but definitely aren't providing the comfort I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom of five

customer_reviews.title: My favorite boots. I purchased these over a year ago ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite boots. I purchased these over a year ago and they are still looking great. Very comfortable. I wear them several times per week and am still pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Have loved Justin Boots in the past but these boots were ...
customer_reviews.text: Have loved Justin Boots in the past but these boots were unbelievably too small. Couldn't even get my foot into them and I bought the same size as I have been wearing. Switched to Ariat as they offered a wide width and that worked.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sargeant

customer_reviews.title: she loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom and she absolutely loves them. this is her first pair of boots, i already have 2 pair, and she would always borrow mine, finally i decided to spoil her and buy her a pair which im very happy i did. never saw mom smile this much :) thank you very much!!! will be shopping from you soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Justin Still Makes Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of Justin boots over 25 years ago and still have them. So, I saw these and wanted to get another pair of Justin boots. They met every expectation. Unfortunately, they were too small and I had to return them! BUT.... I'm going to order another pair ... just larger! I really do like these boots and am going to give them another try with a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and quality of durability
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and quality of durability, but..... one boot fits smaller than the other. I had hoped after time it would loosen up, nope, and is a bit uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tabsimmons85

customer_reviews.title: I love
customer_reviews.text: LOVEEEEEE . Nothing bad to say about these Justin boots
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great work boot for the price, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are extremely comfortable, easy to clean, pretty warm, tight around the instep (no shifting around when a control is required), spacy in the front and still stylish. I bought the waterproof boots for trail rides (including short walks in rough terrain) and working at the barn. They're perfect for temparatures between 40°F up to 65°F and rainy (muddy) days. Depending on your saddle and the length of your legs the low boot leg may cause a bit of a problem as you may get stuck on the fender when moving your calfs on the horse.
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: Well made boot but they definitely run a full size ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made boot but they definitely run a full size bigger. I'm usually an 11 so that's what I ordered and I was swimming in them. Guess I'll have to return them and try again...
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Chipules

customer_reviews.title: Too small, not true to size
customer_reviews.text: My previous pair of Justin Gyspy boots were a perfect fit. The pair I just got is small and a little narrow. In other words the new boots are not comfortable. I have used my other pair for horseback riding and never had to break them in. What happened ?
customer_reviews.author: Sherry J.

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good time and as expected. Unfortunately one boot had a security tag left on it, one of the ones that take a special tool to get them off. Took forever to finally remove it with pliers and now have a spot with torn leather on the boot. Wasn't too happy. They also arrived with what would appear to be a complimentary roll of Duck Tape lol
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Justins
customer_reviews.text: Love my Justins! We've had record rainfall here this winter & so far these boots are holding up extremely well in all the thick mud & very wet conditions. Comfortable & cute style too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best durable boots you can buy
customer_reviews.text: These boots lasted me 6 years! Best darn boits you can buy. I have worn them to hell and back in mud, with dresses, and all til the insides gave as the exterior is just intact and dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Peck

customer_reviews.title: Ready to order another pair love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots no need to break in ordering another pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were a gift for my daughter. She loves ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my daughter. She loves them and they fit just right. Also she checked the price at a local farm supply and the same boots sold for $30 more than these.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Justin Boots Women's Gypsy Boot are the most comfortable boots I have ever bought in my life
customer_reviews.text: Justin Boots Women's Gypsy Boot are the most comfortable boots I have ever bought in my life. I always get compliments while wearing them. My feet never hurt. I wear them almost everyday to do just bout anything. I can wear thin socks over thick socks and they still fit about the same. My feet are never cold while wearing them. I've worn them in the snow and didn't have a problem we cold or wet toes.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kubli

customer_reviews.title: a nice CUTE boot
customer_reviews.text: a great price, $10-$20 cheaper than the western shop . . . I have a bunion & have gotten them stretched but so far have not worn them enough to break them in good in the bunion area, darn shame too as the other boot is awesomely comfortable! I like the leather better on these than the same boot with black foot (I have both)
customer_reviews.author: Jodi A. Braford

customer_reviews.title: Justin Boots
customer_reviews.text: I love Justin boots. I purchased this same pair several months ago and wore them in all conditions at the farm - mud, bath water, rain, red clay, grassy fields, etc, and even while riding my horses. I just purchased these as a replacement for the previous pair that were lost in my house flooding.
customer_reviews.author: JanFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These boots look and feel great. I chose a size 9 instead of my usual 8.5, so they are a little "looser" than one would expect of new boots. However, I have made it through a couple of 10 hour workdays at the hospital and have no complaints. The color and stitching on these boots is awesome. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Dilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! Can get a little uncomfortable when walking ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Can get a little uncomfortable when walking around all day. Keeps water, and debris out of boots. I love these boots, and will buy another pair in a different color in the future.
customer_reviews.author: loopyloretta

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of these boots & So far so ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these boots & So far so good as far as comfort. I have only worn them twice so far, they need to be broke in, once they are they will be even better! :)
customer_reviews.author: NeuView

customer_reviews.title: favorite boots.
customer_reviews.text: i wish they had a bit better inserts, but i love these boots. my bunions fit in gypsys. i'm always a 7 in flip flops, i get a 7 1/2 or 8 in these. 8 so i can add inserts for better arch and cushion.
customer_reviews.author: theBside

customer_reviews.title: buy a size larger or a width wider than you ...
customer_reviews.text: buy a size larger or a width wider than you normally do, these fit a bit small. If I had to do over, I would have bought a full size larger, not just a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: LOIS

product_meta.title: Justin Boots Women's Gypsy Collection Western Boot
product_meta.description: The sassy and versatile Justin Gypsy Cowgirl boot is wardrobe bliss This rider-friendly boot features distressed brown leather foot under a fancy stitched 8" leather shaft. Teak leather pipingfort fabric mesh lining. Patent pending "Gypsy" riding boot rubber outsole. Sturdy unit heel. Single stitched welt. Round toe profile. Shaft circumference is 13" (based on a size 6B).
feature_bullets: Round-toe Western boot featuring decorative stitching and goring at upper
